summary: The diff shows implementation of Admin Center dashboard components with financial overview, transaction history, and backend connection logic. All 6 requirements appear to have corresponding implementation evidence in the modified files.

hallucinated_features.description: Credit account tracking with credit limit and used amount calculations
hallucinated_features.reason: The FinancialOverviewCards component includes credit account functionality (creditLimitCents, usedAmountCents) and displays credit-related cards, but the BuildRequest does not mention credit account features

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple admin dashboard tabs beyond what was requested (fees, employees, transfers, messaging, roadmap, etc.)
hallucinated_features.reason: AdminCenterPage.tsx imports and displays many tabs (FeeConfigurationPanel, EmployeePaymentsPanel, TransfersStubPanel, AdminMessagingPanel, MarketplaceRoadmapAdmin) that were not mentioned in the requirements to restore

hallucinated_features.description: Payment success and failure pages with navigation flows
hallucinated_features.reason: frontend-file-summaries.txt references PaymentSuccess.tsx and PaymentFailure.tsx pages that are not part of the specified requirements
